contentrichtext.text: '''Robert Howard''' is the name of: {{tocright}} ==Sports== *[[Bob Holly]] (born 1963), wrestler whose real name is Bob Howard *[[Robert Howard (athlete)]] (1975–2004), American triple jumper *[[Bob Howard]] (1944–2008), American football player *[[Bobby Howard (wrestler)]], American professional wrestler *[[Robert Howard (martial artist)]] (born 1938), Irish taekwondo master ==Politicians== *[[Rob Howard]] ( [[floruit|fl.]] 2009), Canadian politician *[[Robert Danvers]] aka Robert Howard (1624–1674), politician ==Writers== *Sir [[Robert Howard (playwright)]] (1626–1698), playwright and politician *[[Robert E. Howard]] (1906–1936), writer of fantasy and historical adventure pulp stories and creator of Conan the Barbarian ==Educators== *[[Robert F. Howard]] (1883–1963), educator, rancher and farmer in Texas *[[Bob Howard (academic)|Bob Howard]] (born 1936), educator and political historian in Sydney ==Others== *Sir Robert Howard (1385–1436), father of [[John Howard, 1st Duke of Norfolk]] *Sir [[Robert Howard (royalist)]] (1585–1653), Royalist commander *[[Robert L. Howard]] (1939–2009), Medal of Honor recipient during the Vietnam War *[[Robert Lesarian Howard]], man convicted of murder *Robert Howard ("Dr. Robert", born 1961), British pop star and member of [[the Blow Monkeys]] {{hndis|Howard, Robert}}
